dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Bar scales in "Milliaria Germanica communia" and "Milliaria Gallica communia." In French on verso, with caption title "Description de Guyane ou de la region des Amazones" and signature Vvvvvvvv. From: Hondius. Nouvel atlas, 1639, 1640, 1641, or 1642. Historic Maps copy 2 is uncolored.
